cudf-cu12.macosx-x64: CUDA packages not supported on macOS
cudf-cu12.macosx-aarch64: CUDA packages not supported on macOS
cudf-cu12.windows-x64: CUDA packages not supported on Windows
cudf-cu12.linux-aarch64: CUDA packages not supported on Linux ARM64

cupy-cuda12x.macosx-x64: CUDA packages not supported on macOS
cupy-cuda12x.macosx-aarch64: CUDA packages not supported on macOS
cupy-cuda12x.windows-x64: CUDA packages not supported on Windows
cupy-cuda12x.linux-aarch64: CUDA packages not supported on Linux ARM64

tensorflow.macosx-x64: Use tensorflow-macos on Apple platforms; no official wheel here
tensorflow.macosx-aarch64: Use tensorflow-macos on Apple platforms; no official wheel here
tensorflow.linux-aarch64: No official TensorFlow wheel for Linux ARM64 on PyPI

sccoda.linux-aarch64: Requires TensorFlow and R; no official TF wheels on aarch64

parasail.linux-aarch64: parasail has no binary wheels for Linux ARM64
parasail.macosx-aarch64: parasail has no binary wheels for macOS ARM64

pynacl.windows-x64: pynacl often fails to build on Windows, prefer source
